channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Directorist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Directorist

item.title: CVE-2022-3961|2024-08-03T01:27:53.132Z -- unknown -- directorist
item.description: The Directorist WordPress plugin before 7.4.4 does not prevent users with low privileges (like subscribers) from accessing sensitive system information.

item.title: CVE-2022-3930|2024-08-03T01:27:53.132Z -- unknown -- directorist
item.description: The Directorist WordPress plugin before 7.4.2.2 suffers from an IDOR vulnerability which an attacker can exploit to change the password of arbitrary users instead of his own.
